name: In wine, There is Love
description:
Welcome, to a competition like no other! You puny mortals prayers have been answered and you've been invited to make wine worthy enough for the gods. You will compete with beings you thought weren't even real, but I assure you they are very real and I most certainly assure you they are *very* dateable! ;3

Gamecontrols: 

Left click for clicking

Enter-key for other stuff such as progressing dialogue

Thats it!

Beautiful art by JangoKirby

Bopping music by Wrenwick

Writing by ThugBatman, JangoKirby and Wrenwick.

Programming by, yours truly, Saulizimo.
